best_api

Class BESTQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • best_api.BESTQuery

  • public class BESTQuery
extends java.lang.Object
    It is used as query for BEST. Query string, search filter and the number of results are contained in this class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BESTQuery

        public BESTQuery(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> keyword,
                 java.lang.String filterObjectName,
                 int topN)
        The constructor of BEST Query.
        Parameters:
        keyword - keyword list
        filterObjectName - Filter which BEST can provide. If you want 'All object', Put Null in this parameter.
        topN - The number of results.

      • BESTQuery

        public BESTQuery(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> keyword,
                 java.lang.String filterObjectName,
                 java.lang.String filterQueryName)
        The constructor of BEST Query.
        Parameters:
        keyword - keyword list
        filterObjectName - Filter which BEST can provide. If you want 'All object', Put Null in this parameter.
        filterQueryName - If you want to see the result about only one entity, Put the name of the entity. Don't put a wrong entity name in this field or you'l get no result.
